亘る: (わたる) - (usu. 渡る or 渉る) to cross over/to go across; (usu. 亘る or 亙る)  to extend/to cover/to range/to span
亘古: (こうこ) - for ever; from ancient times
亙る: (わたる) - (usu. 渡る or 渉る) to cross over/to go across; (usu. 亘る or 亙る)  to extend/to cover/to range/to span
亙古: (こうこ) - from long ago up until the present day
些か: (いささか) - a little; a bit; somewhat

些事: (さじ) - something small or petty; trifle
些少: (さしょう) - trifling; little; few; slight
